title: Check Attorney CLE Compliance
description: A firm administrator needs to check the Continuing Legal Education (CLE) compliance status for all attorneys in the firm ahead of the annual reporting deadline.

tasks.description: For each attorney, access the state bar's online portal to check their reported CLE credits.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the current credit status for each attorney.

tasks.description: Compare the reported credits against the state's annual requirements, including any requirements for specific topics like ethics.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies any attorneys who are deficient in their required credits.

tasks.description: Send a reminder email to any attorney who is not yet in compliance, notifying them of their remaining requirements and the deadline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent proactively notifies attorneys who need to complete more CLE.
